title: 111_hr5333
content: The Act titled "Children of Military Service Members Commemorative Lapel Pin Act" recognizes dependent children of Armed Forces members. The Act "Children of Military Service Members Commemorative Lapel Pin Act" establishes a lapel button for eligible children of active duty military members, designed by the Secretary of Defense. An application process is set up for eligible children to receive the button upon payment of a fee. The Act establishes a children of military service members commemorative lapel button for eligible child dependents of members. The presentation is subject to covering manufacturing and distribution costs. Each eligible child dependent may receive one button, but if they are dependent on multiple members, they can receive a button for each. Replacement of lost or damaged buttons may be done by the Secretary concerned. The Act establishes a children of military service members commemorative lapel button for eligible child dependents of members. The Secretary concerned may replace lost or damaged buttons upon application and payment. The term 'eligible child dependent' is defined as a dependent of a member of the armed forces. The Secretary of Defense will issue necessary regulations for implementation. The Act establishes a children of military service members commemorative lapel button for eligible child dependents of members. The Secretary of Defense should expedite the design, manufacture, and issuance of the button. Retroactively, the button will be available to anyone who can prove eligibility. The Act establishes a children of military service members commemorative lapel button for eligible child dependents of members. The Secretary of Defense will provide an application process for eligible individuals to apply for the button. Additionally, the Secretary will notify qualifying members of the Armed Forces about the availability of the button within 60 days of enactment. The Act establishes a children of military service members commemorative lapel button. Applications must be submitted within one year of announcement by the Secretary of Defense. Costs, limitations, and exceptions apply to the presentation of the lapel button.
